ResearchProjectDef.label: archosynthesizing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover the secrets of the archotech's archocompound and use it to archosynthesize archotech artifacts.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: You have unlocked the ancient capabilities of the archocompound resource and vanometric cores and you can now use them to re-create archotech artifacts, quantum weapons and even your own vanometric power cells.
